name: Bike Island Zero
description:
A lone bike rides through the desert. Amongst rusty shipping containers, one brave metal soul races against the clock.

Take control.
Maneuver through the obstacles.
Get the best time.

A few colors that are used (both game and this page) come from the asian15 palette by @arts_of_win

There is no audio.

Made using SDL2 and Emscripten
